name: The Stories of Caelum
description:
This is the first demo version and this project is still under development. After playing, help us by participating in our research of perceptions, which is part of our academic work of course completion:The Stories of Caelum

“Caelum was a very old library, that for a long time has safely kept the knowledge of the world. With mysterious beauty, mingled the countless shelves to the artifacts of many different places… Tob wakes up in a room and begins to explore the corridors and rooms finding many challenges, many rooms are locked and he needs to continue. Soon he realizes that that place was different, and those stories seemed restless. He will venture into these stories trying to understand more of Caelum.”

  • Immersive narrative action and adventure game
  • Puzzles and challenges of reasoning, perception and skills
  • Play with the keyboard or gamepad
  • Several interconnected stories
  • Game localized in Portuguese and English
  • With closed caption
  • Project in development by students from Curitiba, Brazil

Credits:

  • Christhian Gruhh (@cgruhh)
  • Renata Silvério (@rezinha1508)
This is the first demo version and this project is still under development. 

After playing, help us by participating in our research of perceptions, which is part of our academic work: caelumjogo.com.br/survey

If you are Brazilian, go to: caelumjogo.com.br/pesquisa
